channel.title: Problem with loading
channel.description: [u][b]I have a problem with loading the game[/b][/u]. When i click to open the game it loads for a second, then immidiately closes. Please tell me how to fix this problem. :)

item.title: Problem with loading
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

You mean the moparscape client?
Yeah itâ€™s a bit of a *****. Had that myself a lot of times.
Keep trying to open the client, after a while it will work. It has something to do with the file it has to download when you first open the client. Once it has downloaded it, it will work just fine.

Good luck!

Read full topic
